author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video for a walkthrough of the workflows and features used to create the animatic for Beta’s Intro—the animated short at the heart of the A-COM Animatic Sample.

Learn how to use the Praxinos Odyssey plugin to sketch, block shots, and animate 2D elements directly inside Unreal Engine, bridging the gap between storyboarding and layout.

Download the A-COM Animatic Sample here: https://epic.gm/agora-animation-sample

#Animation, #ACOMAnimaticSample, #Storyboarding, #PraxinosOdyssey, #UnrealEngine5.6, #AgoraStudio
title: A-COM Animatic Sample: Project Walkthrough

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Check out Agora Studio’s two new animation sample projects for UE: the A-COM Animatic Sample and A-COM Animation Sample. Learn how to storyboard and animate a short in Unreal Engine: https://epic.gm/agora-animation-sample

#Animation, #ACOMAnimaticSample, #UnrealEngine5.6, #AgoraStudio
title: A-COM Animation Sample Now Available | Unreal Engine

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video for a walkthrough of the animation workflows and features in Unreal Engine 5.6 used to create Beta’s Intro—the animated short at the heart of the A-COM Animation Sample.

Dive under the hood of a complete animation pipeline: from rigging and keyframe animation to lighting, visual effects, and rendering—all managed directly in UE5.
Download the A-COM Animation Sample here: https://epic.gm/agora-animation-sample

#Animation, #ACOMAnimaticSample, #UnrealEngine5.6, #AgoraStudio
title: A-COM Animation Sample: Project Walkthrough
